subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: After benches cleared in the first inning and San Diego Manager Bud Black was tossed in the seventh, Yangervis Solarte’s two-run single lifted the Padres in extra innings.
snippet: After benches cleared in the first inning and San Diego Manager Bud Black was tossed in the seventh, Yangervis Solarte’s two-run single lifted the Padres in extra innings.
